title: Assistant suddenly in UK English instead of US English and (therefore) routines stopped working
content:
Hi

My assistant, both on my phone (Galaxy s8+) and Google Home's (and mini) suddenly started speaking in UK English instead of US English. Also, and I think this is related, my routines stopped working (both basic and self made routines). I haven't changed anything in the settings. I tried to reset one of my Home's, without result. Hope anyone can help me?

Regards
Christophe
